members.name: CSSStyleDeclaration.cssText
members.description: Textual representation of the declaration block. Setting this attribute changes the style.

members.name: CSSStyleDeclaration.length
members.description: The number of properties. See the item() method below.

members.name: CSSStyleDeclaration.getPropertyValue()
members.description: Returns the property value given a property name.

members.name: CSSStyleDeclaration.removeProperty()
members.description: Removes a property from the CSS declaration block.

members.name: CSSStyleDeclaration.setProperty()
members.description: Modifies an existing CSS property or creates a new CSS property in the declaration block/.

members.name: CSSStyleDeclaration.getPropertyCSSValue()
members.description: Only supported via getComputedStyle in Firefox. Returns the property value as a CSSPrimitiveValue or null for shorthand properties.
